title: Best of The Herd for May 25, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 25, 2020
description:
Colin explains why golf needs to be more like The Match with Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Tom Brady and Peyton Manning, why nobody needs to deal with diva wide receivers anymore, how Michigan's President showed us why Jim Harbaugh is doing a great job, why Tom Brady will easily win the divorce with Bill Belichick., where Colin was right and where Colin was wrong. Plus, Peter King joins the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
